elements.text: Hi everyone, our team is expanding and we are hiring an EU based Sales Product Specialist. If you would like an informal discussion about the role, I'm happy to have a conversation;

attachments.fallback: englishcareers: Sales Product Specialist (m/w/d) in Remote | Careers at Germany Remote
attachments.text:
Bruker Coorporation’s companies belong to the world’s leading analytical and measuring instrumentation manufacturers in the sector of life sciences. For the last 60 years Bruker has been fulfilling one single purpose: to deliver the best technological solution.  Today, more than 8,500 employees worldwide are working on this challenge, in over 90 locations in all continents.
 
The Luxendo GmbH is located in Heidelberg, Germany and develops, produces, and sales worldwide high-end fluorescence microscopes with a broad application spectrum in the life sciences. Over the past years, Luxendo has developed several product platforms that allow to acquire high resolution 3D datasets of living or chemically cleared samples with unprecedented imaging speed.

For our Luxendo team, we are currently looking for a Sales Product Specialist (m/f/d). This position might be located in Germany or in France and will require frequent visits to customer base throughout Europe and ability to travel to company sites upon request. 
 
As Sales Product Specialist you will be responsible for high level pre- and post-sales of Bruker Nano Surface’s Fluorescent Microscopy (FM) business unit products in Europe, specifically automated microscopy, light-sheet systems, image data processing systems and accessories. Job duties primarily include direct consultative sales and application understanding and teaming with sales applications personnel in the factory to drive and win business.
